PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DiscreteAccessoryWireLoop
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Shape properties common to wire loop joint connectors.

PropertyDef.Name: WireLoopBasePlateThickness
PropertyDef.Definition: The thickness of the base plate.

PropertyDef.Name: WireLoopBasePlateWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The width of the base plate.

PropertyDef.Name: WireLoopBasePlateLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The length of the base plate.

PropertyDef.Name: WireDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal diameter of the wire.

PropertyDef.Name: WireEmbeddingLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The length of the part of wire which is embedded in the precast concrete element.

PropertyDef.Name: WireLoopLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The length of the fastening loop part of the wire.
